name: Special Requests by donation
description:
Special Requests

I work on special requests for a LOVE offering. These requests are handled as a group every Thursday. You do not need to be online at the time of the healing. Your healing request can be for yourself or for another person or pet. Please be sure to tell me who you’re requesting a healing for in the notes. Thank you for your generous donations.

options.name: special requests by email or Facebook

name: Intuitive Life Coaching
description:
Intuitive Life Coaching

As a Coach U certified coach and intuitive healer I listen and hear you on the soul level. Then I help you connect with your true potential. Are you stuck in life? Do you seek balance? Take the mystery out of relationships! Find love and peace! Discounted monthly packages available see options

options.name: One time half hour of intuitive Life coaching
Meet for 30 minutes 3 times per month
Meet for 30 minutes twice a month

name: Angel Card Reading
description:
Angel Card Reading

Ask the Angels two questions. Their answers are uncanny. They are here to offer their comfort and encouragement.

name: Personal Distance Reiki Healing
description:
Personal Healing Sessions

Reiki that is yours and yours alone! The weekly and monthly healings I offer are sent to an entire group of people. While very effective, people sometimes want the personal attention of a one to one connection. A personal distance healing lasts approximately 30 minutes and can be sent to anyone, anywhere in the world. If you’re purchasing a healing for someone else, permission is generally needed...I will make an exception to this rule if the person is incapacitated and cannot speak for themselves. Please include the name of the person to receive healing in the notes.

name: Weekly Distance Reiki Group Healing / monthly subscription
description:
Monthly Subscription for Weekly Distance Reiki Group Healing

Because of the positive feedback I am receiving on the FREE Monthly Facebook Reiki Healing I am adding a Weekly Healing Group. For only $20 per month you will receive a distance healing each week on Sunday evening. Imagine a Reiki healing session for less than the price of a latte! You do not have to be online at the time of the healing to receive the energy. It will find you where you are. You can also ask questions and interact with me on my Facebook page.

options.name: Weekly Group Distance Reiki Healing Monthly Subscription
